attributes.action: officially allow the singing of the 2nd verse of 'I vow to thee my country'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the patriotic song: 
'I vow to thee my country' 
is a stirring and quintessentially British song and hence, officially, all 3 verses should be sung. The 2nd verse, banned on the terms of being politically incorrect, contains no hateful or offensive text, just an undertone of heated patriotism. To not allow the best verse of this pleasant song to be sung would be such a travesty.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
